com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment

Class ThemeFragment<T extends DynamicAppTheme>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.fragment.DynamicFragment
        • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment.ThemeFragment<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicThemeFragment

    public abstract class ThemeFragment<T extends DynamicAppTheme>
extends DynamicFragment
    Base theme fragment to provide theme editing functionality.

    Extend this fragment to implement theme attributes according to the need.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected T mDynamicAppTheme
      Dynamic app theme used by this fragment.
      protected T mDynamicAppThemeDefault
      Default dynamic app theme used by this fragment.
      protected boolean mSettingsChanged
      true if the settings has been changed.
      protected File mThemeExported
      Temporary file to store the exported theme.
      protected ThemePreview<T> mThemePreview
      Theme preview used by this fragment.
      protected static int REQUEST_THEME_IMPORT
      Constant to request the theme import from file.
      protected static int REQUEST_THEME_LOCATION
      Constant to request the theme file location.

        Parameters:

      • loadTheme

        protected abstract void loadTheme(T theme)
        Update settings according to the supplied theme.
        Parameters:
        theme - The dynamic app theme to be loaded.

      • onSetActionIcon

        public abstract void onSetActionIcon(boolean enable)
        This method will be called on setting the action icon.

        It can be used to change the action icon while sharing the theme.

        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable the action icon;

      • getThemePreview

      • importTheme

        protected void importTheme(boolean file)
        Show dialog to import the theme.
        Parameters:
        file - true to import form the file.

      • importTheme

        protected void importTheme(String theme,
                           boolean file)
        Try to import the supplied theme string.
        Parameters:
        theme - The theme string to be imported.
        file - true if importing form the file.

      • invalidTheme
